name: Casino Cat
description:
Casino Cat is a platformer about Cat's adventures in a weird slot-machine world. Pick up cards-weapons, collect keys and beat bosses to finish your bad trip!

The project was born as a weekly game for DevCup NextCastleParty 2015 (Russian indie and retro games festival).

Free music by RoccoW, HolyKonni and Wandschrank

Twitter: https://twitter.com/indieaardvark
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/indieaardvark/
Tumblr: http://indieaardvark.tumblr.com/

Controls (keyboard):
[start] - space
[move] - left, right
[jump] - up
[shot] - z

Controls (xbox360 gamepad):
[start] - start
[move] - left stick, d-pad
[jump] - a
[shot] - x
